https://tmrev.io/movie/746182-Boom! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lO31vPGp5YDmwCplNlMHPry3ZNF.jpg The lives of a frustrated explosives police officer and an anxious anarchist collide around a bomb ready to explode: In a symbolic act, Officer Guzman wants to vent his mundane life while the rebel Ivan wants to test prejudices around terrorism . In the end it is not known which of the two will lose. Boom!
